features: The micellar water formula creates a gentle cleansing intimate care and feminine body wash that’s clinically tested for sensitive skin
Simply Sensitive is a subtly floral fragrance for a barely there impression and gentle enough for your most delicate skin; under your arms, breasts, and even in your intimate area
Summer’s Eve daily gentle feminine wash is gynecologist tested, free from dyes and parabens, and the product is not tested on animals
Uniquely formulated and pH balanced to match the intimate area’s natural chemistry
body.description: Experience a gentle kind of cleansing with micellar water for your intimate area. A clean experience that isn't complicated and overdone. A daily intimate care routine that lets you experience that unique everyday Summer’s Eve readiness. This Simply Sensitive 3 fl oz feminine wash is great for first time trial and on the go occasions since it is a TSA approved size. Summer's Eve feminine wash is created for your most intimate areas to gently cleanse away the bacteria that can cause odor. Uniquely formulated and pH-balanced to match your body's natural chemistry. All Summer's Eve feminine hygiene products are gynecologist tested to ensure they are safe, even for sensitive skin. That’s why millions of women trust our expansive range of gynecologist-tested cleansing and care. Our wide variety of products are made for everybody and ideal with your travel size toiletries – whether you’re at home or on the go, want to bask in fragrant lusciousness or no scent at all or want ultra-gentle or high performance. With every Summer’s Eve product you use, know that We See You, We Get You, We Got You.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Micellar Water Formula 2 Clinically Tested 3 Gynecologist Tested 4 pH-Balanced 5 Free From Dyes & Parabens

Summer's Eve Gentle Neutralizes Odor pH-balanced Gently Cleanses Absorbs Moisture Sensitive Skin Free from Parabens Neutralizes Odor pH-balanced Gently Cleanses Absorbs Moisture Sensitive Skin Free from Parabens

What is unique about Summer's Eve Gentle Collection? Our Gentle Collection caters to those with want extra gentle products with light to no fragrances. The products in this Collection include our Simply Sensitive and Fragrance Free lines and are designed to have the gentlest touch. Why does pH matter? It's important to your body’s natural defense and maintaining a good environment for a healthy external vaginal area. The pH of ordinary soap, can be very basic (high pH) and may not complement the natural pH range of your external vaginal area. Isn’t Summer’s Eve and Fem Care just if you have a problem? I don’t have an issue “down there” … The external vaginal area is different than other parts of your body – its delicate, and has a different pH than other areas of the body – and so it needs a different kind of care. What can I do if I experience vaginal itching? If you are experiencing vaginal itching, we recommend you talk with your doctor or healthcare professional about your symptoms. If you know that you have a yeast infection, you can find relief with one of our Monistat products.

reviews.reviewText: Great product; nice cute travel size. Hard to find this size in stores, so I was happy to see Amazon carry it.

reviews.reviewText: The product is great, but 3 small bottles? Not so great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Summer's Eve Sensitive Skin Is Worth It
reviews.reviewText: These little 3 oz. bottles are great for travel and spending the night somewhere. I believe they are TSA compliant because of their size. I also like the fact that they have no fragrance and is formulated for sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've tried Summer's Eve Simply Sensitive Feminine Body Wash, and it's become a part of my daily routine for maintaining feminine hygiene. This product is both gentle and effective in removing odor and keeping me feeling fresh.One of the things I like about it is that it's pH balanced, which is essential for maintaining the natural balance of the intimate area. The gentle formula makes it suitable for everyday use without causing any irritation. The fact that it comes in a travel-size 3-pack is convenient for those on the go.The only reason I'm not giving it a full 5 stars is that it doesn't stand out as exceptional compared to some other similar products on the market. However, it does what it's supposed to do and provides that extra level of freshness and confidence I look for.In summary, Summer's Eve Simply Sensitive Feminine Body Wash is a reliable choice for daily feminine hygiene, and the travel-sized packs are a practical bonus.
